Author: Danny7007, Grunkle Squeaky
Description: Deduce an Euler square of playing cards, then pick the two cards to create the optimal poker hand over 3 stages.
Name: Memory Poker

Souvenir.Explanation:
Souvenir could ask about the cards that flipped over in each stage. 
Souvenir cannot ask about the initial grid, because the module allows free interactions after it is solved.
